original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields down, rupee end at 291.50/292.50 to US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bonds end lower on Tuesday, dealers said and the Spot US dollar closed weaker at 291.50/292.50 rupees, dealers said.
The Spot US dollar closed at 290.50/291.00 rupees rupees on Monday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 24.00/10 percent down from 24.65/70 percent a day earlier, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 25.00/50 percent down from 25.30/26.25 percent a day earlier.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 closed at 26.00/50 percent, down from 26.30/27.30 percent at last close.
